meanings.definition: Situated or occurring beneath the ear.
meanings.sent1: The subaural headphones fit comfortably under the ears.
meanings.sent2: She felt the subaural sound vibrations as she listened to music.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat whispered subaural secrets to the dog.
meanings.sent4: The subaural presence of the underground train could be felt through the floor.
meanings.sent5: The subaural sensation of the gentle breeze was soothing.

meanings.definition: Relating to or located below the ear.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the subaural area for any signs of infection.
meanings.sent2: The subaural piercing was a unique and subtle choice.
meanings.sent3: The subaural hearing aid was so tiny, it was almost invisible.
meanings.sent4: Her subaural necklace complemented her elegant attire perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The subaural microphone captured even the faintest sounds.
